description: Герой приглядывается к противнику, подмечая уязвимые точки, и в нужное время наносит коварный удар!
name: Для опытов
note:
<setup action> 
opacity user: 30%
</setup action> 

<target action>
wait: 15
move user: target, back base, 9
wait: 15
move user: backward
wait: 15
action animation: target
motion attack: user
wait for movement
wait for animation
action effect
wait: 15
</target action>

<finish action>
move user: forward
wait: 15
opacity user: 100%
</finish action>

description: Deals dark damage to all enemies.
name: Darkness

description: Deals defense ignoring damage to one enemy.
name: Burst

description: Deals defense ignoring damage to all enemies.
name: Nuclear

description: For 5 turns, user gains fire attribute.

description: For 5 turns, user gains lightning attribute.

name: Enhance Spell

description: Puts all enemies to sleep and greatly lower their MDF.

description: For 4 turns, user has MP regen.
name: Magic Pulse

description: For 3 turns, user evades all magic attacks.
name: Spell Resistance

name: Mana Barrier
